group.name: Torvaldsland 2
group.shortDescription: Pure chaos sim with friendly aliens and shenanigans.
group.longDescription: Discover a place full of wonders and buildings to visit, take a car for a spin in this interactive and friendly homeworld of AFKEA and more.

group.name: Stargate Command
group.shortDescription: Visit the iconic Stargate SG-1 base.
group.longDescription: The Stargate Command (SGC) is a top-secret military organization located in the Cheyenne Mountain Complex in Colorado. It is responsible for operating the Stargate and all off-world activities involving it. The facility is equipped with multiple levels, interactions and NPCs.
